title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 38.10 - Consultants
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 38.10 - Consultants

State Regulations

The State Comptroller may employ such consultants as from
time to time he deems advisable. The State Comptroller shall select such
consultants on the basis of their reliability, experience, overall ability to
provide high-quality service, cost and any other factors deemed relevant by the

State Comptroller. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
38.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
